site_name: Fielden House28-42 London Bridge StreetLondonSE1
description: Details of Condition 27 (Car Park Management Plan) relating to planning permission 17/AP/4008: Variation to Condition 1 (Approved Plans) which was an amendment to planning permission 14/AP/1302 for: Demolition of existing buildings and erection of part 26 and part 16 storeys to provide 148 apartments (118 Use Class C3 and 30 flexible use C1/C3), with 1,800sqm (gross) of flexible retail space (Classes A1, A2, A3 and A4) at St Thomas Street and London Bridge Street (Concourse) levels, service area, three levels of basement including car parking (28 spaces) and associated hard and soft landscaping, amenity spaces and alterations to existing highways adjoining.
